notes:
This dataset contains population estimates for Armenia from 2016 at country-level and first administrative level. It includes a breakdown by urban and rural areas and has population disaggregated by sex and age. 

The file includes a sheet with metadata.

Please note that more recent population data at admin1 level is available (from 2017: http://www.armstat.am/file/article/sv_12_16r_520.pdf), but it is not disaggregated by age nor sex.

Data from the 2011 population census is available here: https://data.humdata.org/dataset/armenia-population-census-2011
